website_summaries.verdict: This handbag offers sophisticated styling that works for any season and numerous fashions, and it comes in a size that many owners say is just right.
pros: An attractive, classic look - pebbled leather in various colors with brown leather trim
Has handles and a strap that can be detached
Mid-size is easy to carry yet can fit your necessities
cons: The strap isn't long enough for most individuals to carry the bag crossbody

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Dooney and Bourke.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red Dooney. It’s beautiful. The smell of leather permeated from the bag as soon as I pulled the plastic off of it. It came with a certificate of authenticity for registration, a protective bag, and all the bells and whistles expected from an authentic Dooney and Bourke handbag. It’s gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: becky larson

customer_reviews.title: I really really love it, i'm very very happy
customer_reviews.text: All the words that I can say about this handbag, is wow!,, wow!,,I really really love it, i'm very very happy,,😊 it was very nice, this is my Number 4 order, in I love Dooney company, so far very good,, very satisfied and happy, this is definitely deserve a five-star from me,,
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love this purse.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The purse arrived in a timely fashion. This is my second purse by dooney and Burke. Wears well lots of room. I like that my larger cell phone has a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Dooney & Bourke Satchel
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy to receive it and loved the look of it. Very classy. It's brand new so I have not used it yet and am anxious to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Freida M. Ehrsam

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and most importantly, my wife likes it. That's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Schoenert

customer_reviews.title: Always looking for a deal, not people who over charge
customer_reviews.text: Love the handbag UNHAPPY with being over charged almost $30.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good quality and still looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: Have carried this almost a year. Love it! Good quality and still looks brand new. It is the only bag i have carried.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag , lots of space just love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kanthany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great purse, exactly what i wanted for size and color, very high quality
customer_reviews.author: PSams

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to get this bag again. I was worried I wouldn't find another just like the one I already own. I just love it. It is perfect for me. Has all the right compartments. Am saving it until the old one needs replacing. Quality is great, I've had the old one three years and use it all year round. Still looks terrific. Dooney and Bourke are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Myrlynn

customer_reviews.title: Good but can find it far cheaper elsewhere...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, my girl loves it. However, same exact bag was only $99.99 at T.J. Maxx... Just sayin', price on here is a tad bit exorbitant.
customer_reviews.author: John Hiebs
